ModMetaData.name: OP-G Stuffed Arms'n'Armor
ModMetaData.author: Copper boltwire
ModMetaData.description:
For v1.2 and v1.3 [h1]About:[/h1] Makes Core and Royalty Armors and Weapons Stuffed.
I'm not at all concerned about balance. It was not the goal of this mod. I just wanted the items to be stuffed, and I succeeded with flying colors. [h1]Requirements:[/h1] You do NOT need Royalty DLC for this mod, but it is highly advised you get that DLC. Worth every coin. [h1]--------[/h1] This was made for myself and shared with you people. That's about it. Mod offered as is.
Enjoy, or do not. Eh....
